channel.title: Godsword Glitch
channel.description:
Well when i equip a Saradomin Godsword, Bandos Godsword, Zamorak Godsword, or Armadyl I get my character to do this, and so does everyone else. If you could tell me how to fix it, it would be great. Thank You! Without it on.....
[img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/Some/Without.png[/img]
This is with The Godsword on :'( [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/Some/With.png[/img]
And this is when I walk with it :'( [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/Some/Walk.png[/img]

item.title: Godsword Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

thats some fucked up gfx Animation bro.

Do you know if you have the godsword animations client-sided?

This probably has to do with the wrong animations being set for the godsword server sided.

Read full topic
